TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Our deployable shelter systems are engineered to the highest standards, ensuring reliability and performance in the most demanding environments.

🏗️

STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY

Frame Construction

Aluminum alloy 6061-T6

High-strength, corrosion-resistant aluminum framework

Load Capacity

Up to 500 kg/m²

Designed for heavy equipment and personnel loads

Wind Resistance

120 km/h sustained

Engineered for extreme weather conditions

Snow Load

2.4 kN/m²

Certified for heavy snow accumulation

🌡️

ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION

Temperature Range

-40°C to +60°C

Operational in extreme temperature environments

Waterproof Rating

IP65

Protected against dust and water ingress

UV Resistance

10+ years

Long-term exposure protection

Fire Rating

Class A

Fire-resistant materials and construction

See how we've helped organizations overcome unique challenges with custom solutions.

Arctic Research Station

International Polar Research Institute

CHALLENGE

Extreme cold weather research facility in remote Arctic location

SOLUTION

Custom insulated shelter system with specialized HVAC and power systems

RESULTS
Operational in -50°C temperatures
Reduced deployment time by 60%
Improved research efficiency by 40%
Extended operational season by 3 months

Mobile Command Center

Department of Homeland Security

CHALLENGE

Enhanced coordination capabilities
Improved response times by 50%
Cost savings of $2M annually

Mining Camp Complex

Global Mining Corporation

CHALLENGE

Integrated camp system with living quarters, dining, and medical facilities

RESULTS
Accommodated 300+ workers
Improved worker satisfaction by 35%
Reduced operational costs by 25%
Enhanced safety and compliance
